BIFF SALON

[BIFF 2023] ‘Inside the Yellow Cocoon Shell’ Review

By Variety - Guy Lodge

A Spiritual Wander Through Rural Vietnam Makes For a Transfixing Debut

Thien An Pham's supremely accomplished first feature may seem narratively slender for its three-hour runtime, but its layered abundance of sensory detail casts an unshakable spell.

 

Source https://variety.com/2023/film/festivals/inside-the-yellow-cocoon-shell-review-1235607307/#recipient_hashed=0544ccb16309a93104ac73bb5550b4d929df96964a1a9508a9048ec04e03bbc9&recipient_salt=bc048b49bf9ae
